name: Wok Quest!
description:
WOK QUEST! - Ludum Dare Jam 32 entry

A long time ago there was a happy chef, cooking happy meals.
Suddenly a lot of piggies attacked and destroyed his town.
So he sweared revenge! and choosed his deadliest weapon: A WOK!

How to play:

[WASD] to move
[Esq] to pause

Bring the wok to the fire to heat and touch enemies to fry them!

Ludum Dare entry website:
Wok Quest! Ludum Dare page
